_sText:
Final Version of ze_pitchblack. Made to fix fps related issues and balance out the zombie sidedness of the map. Flares no longer flash and lite up a lot more of the terrain. map is now much shorter and does not take anywhere near as long to finish.

Escape ship has been modified to carry more people.


Update - Friday Septemeber 4 2009

change log

zombie triggered traps added to help give humans an easier time.

more lighting added for people to see easier with.

ending platform redesigned

needless things that consume fps taken out.

more vents added so humans can escape to mines route if need be.

when the ship takes off, if you fall out you will die.
